import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { RadioButton } from 'primereact/radiobutton'; function Answer() { const [answer, setAnswer] = useState(null); const correct=null; return (
setAnswer(e.value)} checked={answer === 'answer1'}/>
setAnswer(e.value)} checked={answer === 'answer2'}/>
setAnswer(e.value)} checked={answer === 'answer3'}/>
setAnswer(e.value)} checked={answer === 'answer4'}/>
) } export default Answer
